price: 37 Ne tire-t-il pas son origine d’un liquide insignifiant répandu[1521],
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَكُ نُطۡفَةٗ مِّن مَّنِيّٖ يُمۡنَىٰ
footnotes: [1521] Dans la matrice de la femme.

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: alam yaku nuṭ'fatan min maniyyin yum'nā
